summary.paragraph: Engineering leader with 10+ years of experience building and scaling technical teams. Proven ability to transform prototypes into production systems, mentor engineers, and drive cross-functional initiatives. Founded and led multiple startups, combining technical excellence with strategic business acumen.

skills.title: Leadership & Team Building
bullets: Recruited, mentored, and led engineering teams up to 7 developers, achieving 35% faster delivery.
Established feedback processes and agile development cycles for continuous improvement.
Selected and onboarded new team members while creating comprehensive documentation.
Built cross-functional partnerships between engineering, product, and business stakeholders.

skills.title: Strategic Planning & Execution
bullets: Researched market opportunities increasing potential revenue by 30% through strategic partnerships.
Defined product roadmaps and marketing strategies identifying key promotion channels.
Optimized project budgets by 3 months while maintaining quality and user satisfaction.
Completed startup accelerator program, winning Best SaaS Award with $10,000 grant.

skills.title: Process Improvement & Operations
bullets: Reduced user registration time from 10 minutes to 1 minute through UX improvements.
Minimized incidents at launch reducing support calls through proactive quality measures.
Proposed infrastructure changes lowering maintenance costs and improving change velocity.
Built SOA integration framework reducing development time from 1 month to 1.5 weeks.

experience.company_desc: Leading retail company specializing in electronics and household appliances.
bullets: Led cross-functional team developing unified platform for 40,000 stores and 160,000 users.
Coordinated with product, design, and business teams to define feature requirements and priorities.
Drove stakeholder alignment on KPI tracking and performance management features.
Managed complex SAP integration project ensuring smooth data migration across enterprise systems.
experience.technologies: Scala, Java, PostgreSQL, Docker, REST API, Kubernetes (k8s), SAP

experience.company_desc: Full-stack esports and online gambling company fueled by video gaming growth.
bullets: Drove development of gambling platform from prototype to production ensuring compliance.
Minimized launch incidents and reduced support calls through proactive quality measures.
Improved user experience reducing registration time from 10 minutes to 1 minute.
Proposed infrastructure improvements lowering maintenance costs and improving team velocity.

experience.company_desc: Popular messenger in the UAE and super app for rentals, food, and tickets.
bullets: Led architecture decisions for high-load messenger serving 100,000+ users.
Selected and mentored new team members, creating essential documentation for knowledge transfer.
Built integration framework reducing cross-team development time from 1 month to 1.5 weeks.
Researched and advocated for distributed cloud architecture reducing costs by 50%.

experience.company_desc: Viral messenger in the UAE with automatic message translation features.
bullets: Consulted on development strategy and modeled critical application modules.
Influenced scaling architecture optimizing project budget by 3 months.
Built performance visualization tools improving bottleneck identification by 50%.
Sustained platform growth to 56,000 daily active users through strategic technical decisions.

experience.company_desc: SaaS for incorporation C-corp and LLC with bank integration.
bullets: Founded and led technical strategy for B2B SaaS startup in legal tech space.
Recruited and mentored team of 7 developers, increasing completion speed by 35%.
Built system processing 500 incorporation requests per day with bank integrations.
Developed fraud detection system reducing document validation from 2 hours to 5 minutes.
experience.technologies: Kotlin, Java, Spring, Spark, Thrift, Kafka, PostgreSQL

experience.company_desc: Workflow management platform for describing daily activities and automating routine tasks.
bullets: Founded and led startup from ideation through accelerator program to market.
Researched market opportunities increasing potential revenue 30% through strategic partnerships.
Built marketing strategy and identified key promotion channels for B2B SaaS.
Won Best SaaS Award with $10,000 grant, completing startup accelerator program.
